description: Sends back a reply to let you know the bot is working!
Post a link to the newest episode available for whatever channel you are in. If you are in `#general`, this will send back the newest episode out of all FilmJoy shows.
Displays a random <:dyk:324633372217573377> fact, with a timestamped link to the episode it occurred in.
Displays a message containing fun statistics for all the <:dyk:324633372217573377> facts the bot knows.
Displays a link to the shared Google Sheet that tracks <:dyk:324633372217573377>'s that haven't been added to the bot yet.
